definition: the act of enticing a person to do something wrong (as an offer of sex in return for money)
details:
noun
- the act of enticing a person to do something wrong (as an offer of sex in return for money)
= synonyms: allurement
- request for a sum of money
= synonyms: collection, appeal, ingathering
- an entreaty addressed to someone of superior status
= example: an entreaty addressed to someone of superior status
